import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.datasets.samples_generator import make_blobs
from sklearn.cluster import Birch
source.114e3e59:
data, clusters = make_blobs(n_samples = 500, centers = 7, cluster_std = 0.50, random_state = 0)

data.shape
source.6875809e:
model = Birch(branching_factor = 100, n_clusters = None, threshold = 1.5)
model.fit(data)
source.0c557191:
pred = model.predict(data)
plt.scatter(data[:, 0], data[:, 1], c = pred, cmap='rainbow', alpha=0.6, edgecolors='g')
